name: Jelly Run go
description:
Get ready for the biggest puzzle game ever, filled with sweet jelly!

• No impossible levels! No frustration! Easy enough to be playable for all ages!
• Play all day long!
• Simple, free and relaxing! So addicting you can't put it down!

Discover the challenging bright and fun levels in this enjoyable game.

HOW TO PLAY
• Click buttons to jump, hit and rush!
• Complete the levels!
• Go as long as you can!
• Powerful rhythm help to arrive the terminal!

Try it Now!
